verses.verse: Now Sarai <S%H8297><s%> Abram <S%H87><s%>'s wife <S%H802><s%> gave birth to <S%H3205><s%> him no <S%H3808><s%> sons <S%H3205><s%>: and she had a handmaid <S%H8198><s%>, an Egyptian <S%H4713><s%>, whose name <S%H8034><s%> was Hagar <S%H1904><s%>.

And Sarai <S%H8297><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Abram <S%H87><s%>, See now <S%H3068><s%>, the Lord has prevented <S%H6113><s%> me from bearing <S%H3205><s%>: I pray you <S%H935><s%>, go in unto my maid <S%H8198><s%>; it may <S%H194><s%> be that I may obtain sons <S%H1129><s%> by her <S%H87><s%>. And Abram listened <S%H8085><s%> to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of Sarai <S%H8297><s%>.

And Sarai <S%H8297><s%> Abram <S%H87><s%>'s wife <S%H802><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> Hagar <S%H1904><s%> her maid <S%H8198><s%> the Egyptian <S%H4713><s%>, after <S%H7093><s%> Abram <S%H87><s%> had lived <S%H3427><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>, and gave <S%H5414><s%> her to her husband <S%H376><s%> Abram <S%H87><s%> to be his wife <S%H802><s%>.

And he went in <S%H935><s%> unto Hagar <S%H1904><s%>, and she conceived <S%H2029><s%>: and when she saw <S%H7200><s%> that she had conceived <S%H2029><s%>, her mistress <S%H1404><s%> was despised <S%H7043><s%> in her eyes <S%H5869><s%>.

And Sarai <S%H8297><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Abram <S%H87><s%>, My wrong <S%H2555><s%> is because of you <S%H5414><s%>: I have given my maid <S%H8198><s%> into your bosom <S%H2436><s%>; and when she saw <S%H7200><s%> that she had conceived <S%H2029><s%>, I was despised <S%H7043><s%> in her eyes <S%H5869><s%>: the Lord <S%H3068><s%> judge between me and you <S%H8199><s%>.

But Abram <S%H87><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Sarai <S%H8297><s%>, Behold <S%H8198><s%>, your maid is in your hand <S%H3027><s%>; do <S%H6213><s%> to her as it pleases you <S%H2896><s%>. And when Sarai <S%H8297><s%> dealt harshly with <S%H6031><s%> her <S%H1272><s%>, she fled from her face <S%H6440><s%>.

And the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> found her <S%H4672><s%> by a fountain <S%H5869><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, by the fountain <S%H5869><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%> to Shur <S%H7793><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%>, Hagar <S%H1904><s%>, Sarai <S%H8297><s%>'s maid <S%H8198><s%>, from where <S%H335><s%> did you come <S%H935><s%>? And where will you go <S%H3212><s%>? And she said <S%H559><s%>, I flee <S%H1272><s%> from the face <S%H6440><s%> of my mistress <S%H1404><s%> Sarai <S%H8297><s%>.
And the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto her <S%H7725><s%>, Return to your mistress <S%H1404><s%>, and submit <S%H6031><s%> yourself under her hands <S%H3027><s%>.

And the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto her <S%H7235><s%>, I will multiply your seed <S%H2233><s%> exceedingly <S%H7235><s%>, that it shall not be numbered <S%H5608><s%> for multitude <S%H7230><s%>.

And the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto her <S%H2009><s%>, Behold, you are with child <S%H2030><s%>, and shall bear <S%H3205><s%> a son <S%H1121><s%>, and shall call <S%H7121><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> Ishmael <S%H3458><s%>; because the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has heard <S%H8085><s%> your affliction <S%H6040><s%>.

And he will be a wild <S%H6501><s%> man <S%H120><s%>; his hand <S%H3027><s%> will be against every man <S%H3027><s%>, and every man's hand against him <S%H7931><s%>; and he shall live in the presence <S%H6440><s%> of all his brothers <S%H251><s%>.

And she called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> that spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto her <S%H410><s%>, You God see me <S%H7210><s%>: for she said <S%H559><s%>, Have I also here <S%H1988><s%> seen <S%H7200><s%> him <S%H310><s%> that sees me <S%H7210><s%>?
Wherefore the well <S%H875><s%> was called <S%H7121><s%> Beer <S%H883><s%>–lahai–roi; behold <S%H6946><s%>, it is between Kadesh and Bered <S%H1260><s%>.

And Hagar <S%H1904><s%> gave birth to <S%H3205><s%> Abram <S%H87><s%> a son <S%H1121><s%>: and Abram <S%H87><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>'s name <S%H8034><s%>, which Hagar <S%H1904><s%> gave birth to <S%H3205><s%>, Ishmael <S%H3458><s%>.

And Abram <S%H87><s%> was eighty <S%H8084><s%> and six <S%H8337><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%>, when Hagar <S%H1904><s%> gave birth to <S%H3205><s%> Ishmael <S%H3458><s%> to Abram <S%H87><s%>.
